author: Press
title: Say Hello to social mini-games with a localised competitive edge
text:
(MENAFN Press) London UK – M-BIZ Global a leading provider of mobile game solutions announced that it has launched a new app called Hello Mini-Games. This innovative game app is now available on  and is aimed at all types of gamers – both serious and casual.
Hello Mini-Games () is a social mini-game app that allows players to play 1:1 matches earn points and win prizes. For the first time players can create their own groups with their friends family and colleagues and then compete to rank on a group leaderboard. When players win points to rank in Hello Mini-Games they can potentially win prizes ranging from virtual items to local retailers’ gift vouchers.
Downloadable from Google Play these games are updated regularly giving players a variety of genres to choose from. Ranging from sports and shooting games to casual and matching games users are able to win prizes whenever they play the mini-games. Country-specific events and reward-based competitions will feature periodically within the app providing users with a localized experience.
Massoud Loodin Head of Business M-BIZ Global said: “New content is constantly being churned out to keep consumers interested in short and snappy games that keep them entertained on the move. They can also create groups and compete with their friends family and work colleagues with opportunities to win prizes when they play too.”
“In this day and age it’s not enough to just provide gaming entertainment content but to incorporate social elements that allow users to feel connected to other users and to offer incentives in doing so” Loodin continued.
The android version of Hello Mini-Games is currently being launched worldwide in multiple languages –English Korean French and Vietnamese with additional languages – German Russian Turkish Thai being added in the next month. The IOS version will be released later in the year.
About Hello Mini-Games (M-BIZ Global)
Hello Mini-Games is a product of M-BIZ Global a leading provider of mobile game solutions. Since 2005 it has enabled companies in the mobile gaming industry to expand their customer base and increase their conversions through end-to-end services and strong value propositions. Other M-BIZ products include Branded Mini-Games Pocket Arena and TryNBuy embedding solutions that are available for both Smartphones and feature phones.
